description: Centralized deal data for the baseline-gtm-wizards Claude plugin. Stores company metrics, pricing, assumptions, and calculated ROI outputs that feed into generated sales decks.

tables.name: Deals
tables.description: Active deals in the pipeline. Each deal links to a company, pricing configuration, and assumptions.

fields.name: Deal Name
fields.description: Human-readable deal identifier (e.g. 'Lululemon - AP Automation')

fields.name: HubSpot Deal ID
fields.description: ID from HubSpot CRM for cross-reference

fields.name: Stage
fields.description: Current pipeline stage. Maps to stage deck templates.

fields.name: AE Owner
fields.description: Account Executive responsible for this deal

fields.name: Company
fields.description: Link to the Companies table for financial metrics

fields.name: Created Date
fields.description: When this deal was created

fields.name: Last Deck Generated
fields.description: Timestamp of last deck generation for this deal

fields.name: Deck URL
fields.description: URL of the most recently generated deck (hub.baselinepayments.com)

fields.name: Notes
fields.description: Free-form notes about the deal

tables.name: Companies
tables.description: Company financial and operational data. Sourced from HubSpot, public filings, and discovery meetings.

fields.name: Company Name
fields.description: Legal or common company name

fields.name: Industry
fields.description: Industry vertical for peer benchmarking

fields.name: Annual Revenue
fields.description: Total annual revenue (most recent fiscal year)

fields.name: Current DSO
fields.description: Days Sales Outstanding — current value from financials

fields.name: Current DPO
fields.description: Days Payable Outstanding — for comparison bars in teaser decks

fields.name: Annual Invoice Volume
fields.description: Total annual AP invoice volume

fields.name: Current FTEs in AP
fields.description: Full-time equivalents dedicated to accounts payable

fields.name: ERP System
fields.description: Primary ERP (e.g. SAP, Oracle, NetSuite, Microsoft Dynamics)

fields.name: HubSpot Company ID
fields.description: HubSpot company record ID for API lookups

fields.name: Peer 1 Name
fields.description: Industry peer for comparison (DPO/DSO bars)

fields.name: Peer 1 DPO
fields.description: Peer 1's DPO value

fields.name: Peer 2 Name
fields.description: Second industry peer for comparison

fields.name: Peer 2 DPO
fields.description: Peer 2's DPO value

tables.name: Pricing
tables.description: AE-configured pricing for each deal. Feeds into business case and SOW decks. Only AEs update this table.

fields.name: Pricing ID
fields.description: Auto-generated pricing record identifier

fields.name: Deal
fields.description: Link to the deal this pricing applies to

fields.name: Esker SaaS Annual
fields.description: Annual Esker SaaS license cost (list price before discount)

fields.name: Implementation Fee
fields.description: One-time implementation and configuration fee

fields.name: Transaction Fee Per Invoice
fields.description: Per-invoice transaction fee (if applicable)

fields.name: Discount %
fields.description: Negotiated discount percentage applied to SaaS annual

fields.name: Effective SaaS Annual
fields.description: SaaS annual after discount: Esker SaaS Annual * (1 - Discount %)

fields.name: Effective Cost Per Invoice

options.formula: {Transaction Fee Per Invoice} + ({Effective SaaS Annual} / IF({Annual Invoice Volume} > 0, {Annual Invoice Volume}, 1))

fields.description: Total effective cost per invoice including SaaS spread. Uses linked company's invoice volume via rollup.

fields.name: Annual Invoice Volume
fields.description: Rolled up from company data via Deal link

tables.name: Assumptions
tables.description: Editable assumptions for ROI calculations. Defaults can be overridden per deal. These feed the interactive calculator in discovery and business-case decks.

fields.name: Assumption ID
fields.description: Auto-generated assumption record identifier

fields.name: Deal
fields.description: Link to the deal these assumptions apply to

fields.name: FTE Hourly Rate
fields.description: Fully-loaded hourly cost of an AP FTE. Default: $45.00

fields.name: Target DSO Reduction
fields.description: Expected DSO improvement in days. Default: 5

fields.name: Current Cost Per Invoice
fields.description: Prospect's current all-in cost to process one invoice. Default: $12.88 (IOFM benchmark)

fields.name: Esker Cost Per Invoice
fields.description: Esker's benchmark cost per invoice. Default: $2.78

fields.name: Automation Rate
fields.description: Expected FTE automation/reallocation rate. Default: 60%

fields.name: Discount Rate
fields.description: Discount rate for NPV calculations. Default: 8.0%

fields.name: Revenue Proxy Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for annualRevenue = invoiceVolume * costPerInvoice * X. Default: 8

tables.name: Calculated Outputs
tables.description: Formula-driven ROI outputs. Auto-calculated from Pricing + Assumptions + Company data. These values feed directly into deck stat cards and projection tables.

fields.name: Output ID
fields.description: Auto-generated output record identifier

fields.name: Deal
fields.description: Link to the deal

fields.name: Annual AP Savings

options.formula: ({Current Cost Per Invoice} - {Esker Cost Per Invoice}) * {Annual Invoice Volume}

fields.description: (Current Cost Per Invoice - Esker Cost Per Invoice) * Annual Invoice Volume

fields.name: FTEs Freed

options.formula: MAX(1, FLOOR({Current FTEs in AP} * {Automation Rate}))

fields.description: Number of FTEs reallocated: MAX(1, FLOOR(FTEs * Automation Rate))

fields.name: FTE Reallocation Value
fields.description: FTEs Freed * FTE Hourly Rate * 2080 hours/year

fields.name: Annual Revenue Proxy

options.formula: {Annual Invoice Volume} * {Current Cost Per Invoice} * {Revenue Proxy Multiplier}

fields.description: Rough revenue proxy for working capital calculation

fields.name: Working Capital Freed
fields.description: DSO Reduction * (Annual Revenue Proxy / 365)

fields.name: Total Annual Benefit

options.formula: {Annual AP Savings} + {FTE Reallocation Value} + {Working Capital Freed}

fields.description: Sum of all three benefit streams

fields.name: Payback Months

options.formula: IF({Total Annual Benefit} > 0, ({Implementation Fee} + {Effective SaaS Annual}) / ({Total Annual Benefit} / 12), 99)

fields.description: (Implementation Fee + Year 1 SaaS) / Monthly Benefit

fields.name: Three Year Benefit
fields.description: Total Annual Benefit * 3

fields.name: Three Year Cost
fields.description: 3 years of SaaS + implementation

fields.name: Three Year ROI

options.formula: IF({Three Year Cost} > 0, (({Three Year Benefit} - {Three Year Cost}) / {Three Year Cost}) * 100, 0)

fields.description: ((3-Year Benefit - 3-Year Cost) / 3-Year Cost) * 100

fields.name: NPV

options.formula: -{Implementation Fee} + ({Total Annual Benefit} - {Effective SaaS Annual}) / (1 + {Discount Rate}) + ({Total Annual Benefit} - {Effective SaaS Annual}) / POWER(1 + {Discount Rate}, 2) + ({Total Annual Benefit} - {Effective SaaS Annual}) / POWER(1 + {Discount Rate}, 3)

fields.description: Net Present Value: -Implementation + sum of (Annual Net Benefit / (1+r)^year) for years 1-3
